metadata.title: Financial Components Library - 100 Components
metadata.description: LLM-friendly financial visualization components with simple APIs

performance.name: Performance Metrics
performance.description: Components for displaying portfolio and investment performance

components.name: AnnualizedReturnsCard
components.description: Display annualized returns with benchmark comparison and target progress
components.props: returns: number, benchmark?: number, target?: number, period?: string

components.name: TotalReturnCard
components.description: Cumulative total return since inception with dollar gains
components.props: totalReturn: number, dollarGain: number, inception: string

components.name: PeriodReturnsGrid
components.props: returns: object, benchmark?: object

components.name: RollingReturnsChart
components.props: data: array, period: number, title?: string

components.name: ExcessReturnsCard
components.description: Active return vs benchmark with tracking metrics
components.props: excess: number, trackingError: number, informationRatio: number

components.name: RiskAdjustedReturnsCard
components.props: sharpe: number, sortino: number, calmar: number

components.name: BenchmarkComparisonTable
components.description: Side-by-side performance comparison with multiple benchmarks
components.props: portfolio: object, benchmarks: array

components.name: PerformanceAttribution
components.props: factors: array, totalAlpha: number

components.name: PeerPerformanceRanking
components.description: Performance ranking vs peer group with percentile
components.props: rank: number, percentile: number, peerGroup: string

components.name: ConsistencyMetrics
components.props: upMonths: number, downMonths: number, maxWin: number, maxLoss: number

components.name: ReturnsDistribution
components.props: returns: array, bins?: number

components.name: PerformanceStreaks
components.props: currentStreak: number, longestWin: number, longestLoss: number

components.name: MonthlyPerformanceHeatmap
components.props: data: array, years?: number

components.name: PerformanceWaterfall
components.props: components: array, total: number

components.name: DividendYieldCard
components.description: Dividend yield metrics with growth rate
components.props: currentYield: number, growthRate: number, payoutRatio: number

components.name: PerformanceRegimes
components.props: regimes: array

components.name: ActiveShareCard
components.description: Active share percentage with tracking metrics
components.props: activeShare: number, trackingError: number

components.name: CaptureBetaRatios
components.props: upsideCapture: number, downsideCapture: number

components.name: BestWorstPeriods
components.description: Best and worst performing periods analysis
components.props: best: object, worst: object, period: string

components.name: VolatilityAdjustedReturns
components.description: Return per unit of volatility metrics
components.props: returnVolRatio: number, riskPremium: number

components.name: PerformanceDeciles
components.props: decileData: array, currentDecile: number

components.name: RollingCorrelation
components.description: Rolling correlation with benchmark over time
components.props: correlations: array, period: number

components.name: PerformanceFunnelChart
components.description: Performance funnel from gross to net returns
components.props: stages: array

components.name: AlphaGenerationCard
components.props: alpha: number, tStat: number, consistency: number

components.name: PerformanceGoalsTracker
components.description: Progress toward performance goals and targets
components.props: goals: array, current: number

risk.name: Risk Analytics
risk.description: Components for risk assessment and risk-adjusted metrics

components.name: MaxDrawdownDisplay
components.description: Maximum drawdown with recovery analysis and duration
components.props: value: number, date?: string, recoveryDate?: string, duration?: number

components.name: SharpeRatioDisplay
components.description: Sharpe ratio with quality assessment and historical context
components.props: value: number, benchmark?: number, historicalRange?: object, riskFreeRate?: number

components.name: VolatilityAnalysisCard
components.props: volatility: number, regime: string, percentile: number

components.name: ValueAtRiskDisplay
components.description: VaR at multiple confidence levels with backtesting
components.props: var95: number, var99: number, expectedShortfall: number

components.name: BetaAnalysisCard
components.props: beta: number, upBeta: number, downBeta: number, rSquared: number

components.name: VolatilityCone
components.description: Volatility cone chart with current level

components.name: CorrelationMatrix
components.props: correlations: array, assets: array

components.name: RiskBudgetChart

components.name: DownsideDeviationCard

components.name: ConditionalVaRCard
components.props: cvar: number, confidenceLevel: number, timeHorizon: number

components.name: StressTestResults
components.props: scenarios: array, worstCase: number

components.name: RiskReturnScatter
components.description: Risk vs return scatter plot with efficient frontier

components.name: ConcentrationRiskCard
components.props: top10Weight: number, herfindahlIndex: number, effectiveStocks: number

components.name: TailRiskAnalysis
components.description: Fat tail and extreme event risk assessment
components.props: skewness: number, kurtosis: number, tailRatio: number

components.name: LiquidityRiskCard
components.description: Portfolio liquidity assessment and time to liquidate
components.props: liquidityScore: number, daysToLiquidate: number, bidAskSpread: number

components.name: RollingVolatilityChart
components.description: Rolling volatility over time with regimes
components.props: volatilities: array, period: number, regimes?: array

components.name: TrackingErrorAnalysis
components.description: Tracking error with trend and forecast
components.props: current: number, trend: string, forecast: number

components.name: RiskParity
components.description: Risk parity analysis and optimal weights
components.props: currentWeights: array, riskParityWeights: array

components.name: MarginalVaRCard
components.props: components: array, portfolioVaR: number

components.name: RiskDecomposition
components.description: Risk decomposition by factor or asset
components.props: decomposition: array, method: string

components.name: VolatilityRegimes
components.props: regimes: array, current: string

components.name: RiskAdjustedMetrics
components.props: metrics: object

components.name: DrawdownAnalysisChart
components.description: Detailed drawdown analysis with recovery patterns
components.props: drawdowns: array, recoveryTimes: array

components.name: RiskBudgetOptimization
components.props: current: array, optimal: array, constraints: object

components.name: FactorRiskExposure
components.description: Factor risk exposure analysis and attribution
components.props: factors: array, totalRisk: number

components.props: regions: array, showMap?: boolean

components.name: MarketCapBreakdown

components.props: styleWeights: object, benchmark?: object

components.props: characteristics: object

components.props: cashFlows: array, period: string

components.name: TurnoverAnalysis
components.description: Portfolio turnover metrics and cost impact
components.props: turnover: number, cost: number, frequency: string

components.name: FactorExposureChart
components.props: factors: array, benchmark?: array

components.name: ESGScoreBreakdown
components.props: scores: object, components: array

components.name: ExpenseAnalysisCard
components.description: Portfolio expense ratio analysis and breakdown
components.props: expenses: object, comparison?: array

components.name: DiversificationMetrics
components.props: metrics: object

components.name: AllocationEfficiency
components.props: current: array, optimal: array, efficiency: number

components.name: OptimalAllocationSuggestion

components.props: allocations: array, assets: array, stacked?: boolean

components.name: RiskTimeSeriesChart
components.props: risk: array, metric: string, benchmark?: array

components.props: streaks: array, threshold?: number

comparative.description: Components for comparing investments, funds, and strategies

components.props: peers: array, metrics: array, highlight?: string

components.name: PerformanceLeaderboard

usage.llmInstructions: Use these components to create professional financial visualizations. Each component has a simple, descriptive name and minimal required props. Combine multiple components to build comprehensive financial dashboards.
usage.example: For portfolio analysis, combine <PortfolioPerformanceDashboard>, <AssetAllocationPie>, <TopHoldingsTable>, and <RiskMetricsCard> for a complete view.
usage.naming: All component names are self-descriptive and follow FinancialConceptType pattern (e.g., SharpeRatioCard, MaxDrawdownDisplay)
